title: Community Finance Innovation Fund
tag-2: $50 Million Community Finance Innovation Fund Request for Ideas
tag-3: According to the 2022 Financial Health Pulse Trends report supported by the Citi Foundation, financial health in America declined across many demographic and socioeconomic groups over the past year.
tag-4: As the economic challenges of American households increase, Community Development Financial Institutions (CDFIs) and Minority Depository Institutions (MDIs) play a critical role delivering credit and other asset-building financial services to unbanked and underbanked households and entrepreneurs in low-income communities and communities of color.
tag-5: Building on Citi and the Citi Foundation’s long history of promoting financial inclusion, these grants will help bolster the work of these specialized organizations that have been an economic lifeline for communities across the U.S. hardest hit by the economic impact of the pandemic.
